features.copy: While most test frameworks make it easy to test your code, Crank makes it easy to test where code you own interfaces with code you don't. Crank is your no-code test suite for end-to-end validation across your tech stack.
features.title: Low-Code / No-Code

features.copy: If you're running tests that touch SaaS platforms, you're probably collaborating with less-technical business users. Crank uses an easy-to-read test scenario format that developers and business users alike can understand.
features.title: Meaningful BDD

features.copy: Crank is just the test runner. It runs actions and assertions that come packaged in docker containers we call Cogs. Can't find the Cog for a system in your environment? Build and contribute your Cog back to the community!
features.title: An Open Ecosystem
